anya-e0813n:11_0: Nissāyevā tipemā paṇamiya sirasā niccamesaṃ saritvā,
anya-e0813n:24_0: Niccaṃ ye mettha bālā varahadayayutā suṭṭhu nikkhittanettā,
anya-e0813n:26_0: Gambhīraṃ duttaraṃ te jinavacanudadhiṃ tiṇṇathāmā bhaveyyuṃ,
anya-e0813n:27_0: Laddhopāyā ca candaṃ taditarapacuraṃ sakkataṃ sotukāmā.
anya-e0813n:33_0: Tasmā ettha pamādādi – dosaleso bhave yadi;
anya-e0813n:44_1: Taṃ yathā- a ā- i ī- u ū- e o,
anya-e0813n:44_7: ya ra la va sa ha ḷa aṃ- iti.
anya-e0813n:46_0: Tattha akkharesu okārantā aṭṭha sarā nāma. Tattheti vattate.
anya-e0813n:48_0: Tattha saresu lahumattā a, i, u iti tayo rassā.
anya-e0813n:51_0: Saṃyogato pubbe eo rassā ivoccante, anantarā byañjanā saṃyogo. Ettha, seyyo, oṭṭho, sotthi.
anya-e0813n:53_0: Sare ṭhapetvā sesā kādayo niggahītantā byañjanā.
anya-e0813n:55_0: Byañjanānaṃ kādayo makārantā pañcapañcaso akkharavanto vaggā.
anya-e0813n:56_5: sabbanāma, pada, upasagga, nipāta, taddhita, ākhyāta,
anya-e0813n:58_0: Aṃiti akārato paraṃ yo bindu sūyate, taṃ niggahītaṃ nāma.
anya-e0813n:64_2: “pubbamadhoṭhita massaraṃ sarena viyojaye”ti pubbabyañjanaṃ sarato puthakkātabbaṃ.
anya-e0813n:66_0: Anantare sare pare sarā lopaṃ papponti.
anya-e0813n:67_0: “Nare paraṃ yutte”ti assaro byañjano parakkharaṃ netabbo lokaggo.
anya-e0813n:68_1: tato vaṇṇakālabyavadhāne kāriyaṃ na hoti. Yathā-
anya-e0813n:70_0: 12. Saretyadhikāro. Pana ime pana imetīha-sarā lopaṃ itveva.
anya-e0813n:72_0: Asamānarūpāsaramhā paro saro vā lupyate, paname, panime.
anya-e0813n:75_0: Sare lutte parasarassa kvaci asavaṇṇo hotīti i u iccetesaṃ ṭhānāsannā e o. Bandhusseva. Nopeti.
anya-e0813n:76_0: 14. Tatra ayaṃ, yāni idha, bahu upakāraṃ, saddhā idha, tathā upamantyetasmiṃ –
anya-e0813n:78_0: Sare lutte paro saro kvaci ṭhānāsannaṃ dīghaṃ yāti. Tatrāyaṃ, yānīdha,
anya-e0813n:81_0: Sare lutte pubbo ca kvaci dīghaṃ yāti. Kiṃ sūdha.
anya-e0813n:84_0: Sare pare antassa ekārassa kvaci yo ādeso hoti, tyajja,
anya-e0813n:88_0: Sare pare anto kārukārānaṃ kvaci vo ādeso hoti. Svassa, anveti.
anya-e0813n:92_0: Sare pare dhassa kvaci do hoti. Dīghe – idāhaṃ.
anya-e0813n:95_0: Sare pare ivaṇṇassa yo navā hoti.
anya-e0813n:95_1: Kata yakārassa tissa “sabbo cantī”ti kvaci cādese “paradvebhāvo ṭhāne”ti sarato parabyañjanassa ṭhānāsannavasā dvittaṃ.
anya-e0813n:97_0: Ettha “kvaci paṭi patisse”ti patissa paṭi, vaṇṇaggahaṇaṃ sabbattha rassadīgha saṅgahaṇatthaṃ.
anya-e0813n:100_0: Sarato parassa evassādiekāro rittaṃ navā yāti. Pubbo ca ṭhānāsannaṃ rassaṃ. Yathariva. Yatheva.
anya-e0813n:102_0: Ya va ma da na ta ra ḷā cāgamā.
anya-e0813n:103_0: Sare pare yādayo āgamā vā honti,
anya-e0813n:104_0: Vāti kiṃ. Cha abhiññā, putha eva, pā eva.
anya-e0813n:105_0: Ettha “sare kvacī”ti sarānaṃ pakati hoti, sassarūpameva, na vikārotyattho.
anya-e0813n:110_0: 23. Byañjanetyadhikāro. Kvacītveva. So bhikkhu, kacci nu tvaṃ, jānema tantīha –
anya-e0813n:116_0: Vagge ghosāghosānaṃ catutthadutiyānaṃ tabbagge tatiyapaṭhamā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṃ yutte ṭhāne, ugghoso,
anya-e0813n:118_0: 26. Ava naddhātyatra – “o avasse”ti kvaci avassa o. Onaddhā.
anya-e0813n:122_0: 27. Niggahītantyadhikāro. Kiṃ kato, saṃ jāto, saṃ ṭhito, taṃ dhanaṃ, taṃ mittantiha –
anya-e0813n:124_0: Vaggabyañjane pare bindussa tabbagganto vā hoti. Kiṅkato, sañjāto, saṇṭhito, tandhanaṃ, tammittaṃ.
anya-e0813n:129_0: Sare pare binduno ma dā vā honti. Evamassa, etadavoca.
anya-e0813n:133_0: Ekāre, he ca pare binduno ño vā hoti. Dvitte – taññeva, tameva. Tañhi, taṃ hi.
anya-e0813n:136_0: Yakāre pare tena saha binduno ño vā hoti. Dvitte – saññogo, saṃyogo.
anya-e0813n:137_0: 31. Cakkhu aniccaṃ, ava sirotīha - āgamo, kvacitveva.
anya-e0813n:139_0: Sare, byañjane vā pare kvaci bindvāgamo hoti. Cakkhuṃaniccaṃ, avaṃsiro.
anya-e0813n:146_0: Binduto paro saro vā lupyate, bījaṃva.
anya-e0813n:149_0: Binduto pare sare lutte saṃyogo byañjano vinaṭṭhasaṃyogo hotīti pubbasalopo. Evaṃsa.
anya-e0813n:153_0: Idhāniddiṭṭhā sandhayo vuttānusārena ñe yyā, yathā –
anya-e0813n:155_0: Pari esanātīha – yādese rakārassa yo, payyesa nā.
anya-e0813n:157_0: Sarati, iti eva, sā itthī, busaṃ eva, bahu ābādho, adhi abhavi, sukhaṃ, dukkhaṃ, jīvotīha –
anya-e0813n:158_0: Māgamo sakāre akārassa u ca, sumarati.
anya-e0813n:161_0: Mādese, pubbadīghe ca ekārassa i. Busāmiva.
anya-e0813n:164_0: Binduno, okārassa ca e. Sukhe, dukkhe, jīve.
anya-e0813n:166_1: byañjane vā pare binduno kvaci mo.
anya-e0813n:166_4: pubbe mo paraṃ na netabbo ayuttattā.
anya-e0813n:168_0: Taṃ iminā, evaṃ imaṃ, kiṃ ahaṃ tīha-issa a. Tadaminā.
anya-e0813n:169_0: Issa u, akārassa ca e, bindulopādo. Evumaṃ, kehaṃ.
anya-e0813n:172_0: 43. Alābūnityādo akāralopo. Lābūni sīdanti, silā plavanti.
anya-e0813n:174_0: Akaramhase tetyādo sakāre garuno ekārassa iminā lahuakāro, akaramhasa te kiccaṃ.
anya-e0813n:176_0: Dīgho, saṃyogādipubbo rasso ca garu, lahu tu rasso. Yathā- ā, assa, aṃ, a.
anya-e0813n:185_1: jinavacanayoggaṃ liṅgaṃ idha ṭhapīyati nipphādīyati ca.
anya-e0813n:188_0: Tasmā liṅgā parā vibhattiyo honti. Cakārena tāsaṃ ekavacanādipaṭhamādisaññā ca.
anya-e0813n:189_0: “Si yo aṃ yo nā hi sa naṃ smā hi sa naṃ smiṃ sū” ti vibhattiyo.
anya-e0813n:196_0: Aṃādīsu paresu sarassa lopo hoti, tasmiṃ kate tu kvacādinā asavaṇṇe patte pakati hoti.
anya-e0813n:197_0: Naye paraṃ yutte. Evamupari saralopādi. Buddho.
anya-e0813n:201_0: Akārantā paresaṃ paṭhamadutiyāyonīnaṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ āe vā honti. Buddhā.
anya-e0813n:208_0: Ge pare akāro pitusatthuattarājādīnamanto ca āttaṃ yāti.
anya-e0813n:209_0: “Ākāro vā”ti ge pare ākārassa rasso vā.
anya-e0813n:211_0: So siṃ syā ca sakhāto gassevātyādiniddiṭṭhehaññe avaṇṇivaṇṇuvaṇṇokārantā sesā,
anya-e0813n:211_1: tehi pare gasī lupyante. He - buddha, buddhā. Yo - buddhā.
anya-e0813n:213_0: Yaṃ karoti, taṃ kammaṃ nāma. Tattha dutiyā hoti. Aṃbuddhaṃ. Yossa e-buddhe.
anya-e0813n:216_0: Yo karoti, sa kattā nāma. Tattha tatiyā hoti. Nā.
anya-e0813n:218_0: Akārā paro nā enaṃ yāti. Buddhena.
anya-e0813n:223_0: Sabbasaddehi paresaṃ smāhisminnaṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ mhābhimhiiccete vā honti. Buddhebhi, buddhehi.
anya-e0813n:225_0: Yena vā kayirate, taṃ karaṇaṃ nāma. Tattha tatiyā hoti. Sabbaṃ kattusamaṃ.
anya-e0813n:227_0: Yassa dātukāmo rocate, dhārayate vā, taṃ sampadānaṃ nāma. Tattha catutthī hoti. Sa.
anya-e0813n:230_0: Akārā parassa catutthekavacanassa āyo vā hoti. Buddhāya.
anya-e0813n:234_0: Sunaṃhisu paresu sarādīnaṃ dīgho hoti. Casaddena kvaci na. Buddhānaṃ.
anya-e0813n:236_0: Yasmādapeti, bhayamādatte vā, tadapādānaṃ nāma, tattha pañcamī hoti. Smā.
anya-e0813n:239_0: Akārā paresaṃ smāsminnaṃ āe vā honti. Buddhā, buddhamhā, buddhasmā. Buddhebhi, buddhehi.
anya-e0813n:241_0: Yassa vā pariggaho, taṃ sāmī nāma. Tattha chaṭṭhī hoti. Buddhassa. Buddhānaṃ.
anya-e0813n:243_0: Yodhāro, tamokāsaṃ nāma. Tattha sattamī hoti. Smiṃ-buddhe, buddhamhi, buddhasmiṃ. Su-buddhesu.
anya-e0813n:245_0: Buddho buddha sukhaṃ dadāti sarato buddhaṃ tato dukkaraṃ,
anya-e0813n:246_0: Kiṃ buddhena mahiddhayopi munayo buddhena jātāsukhī;
anya-e0813n:247_0: Buddhasseva manaṃ dade padamahaṃ buddhā labheyyāccutaṃ,
anya-e0813n:248_0: Buddhassiddhi na kiṃ kare bhavabhave bhattyatthu buddhe mama.
anya-e0813n:249_0: 59. Ito paraṃ tatiyāpañcamīnañca catutthīchaṭṭhīnañca sarūpattā pañcamīchaṭṭhiyo bhīyo upekkhante.
anya-e0813n:256_0: 62. “Brahmattasakharājādito amāna”nti brahmādito aṃvacanassa ānaṃ vā hoti. Attānaṃ, attaṃ. Attāno.
anya-e0813n:258_0: “Attānto hismimanattaṃ”ti himhi attantassa ano. Attanehi. Evaṃ karaṇe.
anya-e0813n:261_0: Amhādito smā nā iva hoti. Attanā.
anya-e0813n:262_0: 66. “Tato sminnī”ti smino ni. Attani. “Anatta”nti bhāvaniddesena sumhi ca ano. Attanesu.
anya-e0813n:266_0: Nāmhi savibhattissa rājasaddassa raññā vā hoti. Raññā, rājena.
anya-e0813n:268_0: Sunaṃ hisu paresu rājassa rāju hoti, cakārena kvaci na.
anya-e0813n:269_0: “Sunaṃhisu ceti” dīghe - rājūbhi, rājūhi, rājebhi, rājehi.
anya-e0813n:271_0: “Rājassa rañño rājino se”ti se rañño rājino honti. Rañño, rājino.
anya-e0813n:272_0: “Raññaṃ namhi vā”ti namhi raññaṃ vā. Raññaṃ, rājūnaṃ, rājānaṃ.
anya-e0813n:273_0: 69. Smāssanātulyattā-nāmhi raññā vā. Raññā, rājamhā, rājasmā.
anya-e0813n:274_0: 70. “Smimhi raññe rājinī”ti smimhi raññe rājini honti. Raññe, rājini. Rājūsu, rājesu.
anya-e0813n:277_0: “Ā simhī”ti simhi savibhattissa ntussa ā. Guṇavā.
anya-e0813n:280_0: Paṭhame yomhi savibhattissa ntussa ntokāro hoti. Guṇavanto.
anya-e0813n:283_0: Sunaṃhisu, yosu, cakārena aññesupi paresu ntussanto attaṃ yāti. Guṇavantā.
anya-e0813n:286_0: Ge pare savibhattissa ntussa aṃaā honti. Heguṇavaṃ,guṇava, guṇavā. Yo - guṇavanto, guṇavantā.
anya-e0813n:288_1: “Totitā sasmiṃ nāsvī”ti savibhattissa ntussa nāmhi tā,
anya-e0813n:290_0: “Namhi taṃ vā”ti namhi ntussa taṃ vā. Guṇavataṃ, guṇavantānaṃ. Smā nāva.
anya-e0813n:293_0: “Simhi gacchantādīnaṃ ntasaddo a”nti ntasaddassa aṃvā, silopo. Gacchaṃ, sissa o – gacchanto.
anya-e0813n:296_0: Vuttaṃ hitvā sesesu gacchantādīnaṃ ntasaddo ntu iva daṭṭhabbo. Gacchanto, gacchantāiccādi.
anya-e0813n:305_0: Kato nikāro lopo ca yesaṃ tesu yosu sarānaṃ dīgho hoti. Aggī. Pakkhe-attantveva.
anya-e0813n:307_0: Yosu akatarasso jho attaṃ yāti. Aggayo. Tathālapane.
anya-e0813n:309_0: Jhalapato aṃ mo ca binduṃ yanti. Aggiṃ. Aggī, aggayo.
anya-e0813n:311_0: 82. “Jhalato sassa no vā”ti sassa nottaṃ vā. Aggino, aggissa. Aggīnaṃ.
anya-e0813n:314_0: 85. Ādi aggīva. Smiṃno pana “ādito o ce”ti aṃ, o ca vā. Ādi, ādo, ādimhi, ādismiṃ. Ādīsu.
anya-e0813n:316_0: “Agho rassa”mādinā rasse sampatte “na sismimanapuṃsakānī”ti simhi anapuṃsakānaṃ na rasso. Silopo, daṇḍī, yolope – daṇḍī. Pakkhe –
anya-e0813n:321_0: Katassā jhato yonaṃ nottaṃ hoti. Daṇḍino.
anya-e0813n:322_0: 87. “Jhalapā rassa”nti ge pare jhalapānaṃ rasso. Hedaṇḍi. Daṇḍī, daṇḍino.
anya-e0813n:324_0: “Naṃ jhato katarassā”ti aṃiccassa naṃ vā. Daṇḍinaṃ, daṇḍiṃ. Daṇḍī, daṇḍino.
anya-e0813n:331_0: “Lato vo kāro ce”ti lato yonaṃ vottaṃ vā.
anya-e0813n:334_0: Vevosu akatarasso lo attaṃ yāti. Bhikkhavo, pakkhe – yolopa dīghā. Bhikkhū.
anya-e0813n:336_0: “Akatarassā lato yvālapanassa vevo”ti ālapane yossa vevokārā, attaṃ. Bhikkhave, bhikkhavo, bhikkhū.
anya-e0813n:339_1: cakārena kvaci vononamabhāvova viseso. Jantuno, jantuyo.
anya-e0813n:341_0: “Satthupitādīnamā sismiṃ silopo ce”ti satthādyantassa ā, silopo ca. Satthā.
anya-e0813n:346_0: Tato ārato yonaṃ o hoti. Satthāro.
anya-e0813n:349_0: 99. “Nā ā”ti ārato nāssa ā. Satthārā. Satthārebhi, satthārehi.
anya-e0813n:351_0: Se satthādyantassa u hoti salopo ca vā. Satthu, satthuno, satthussa.
anya-e0813n:355_0: 102. Pitā sattheva. “Pitādīnamasimhī”ti sitoññesu ārassa rassova viseso. Pitaro.
anya-e0813n:357_0: 103. Abhibhū. Rasse-abhibhuvo. Yolopeabhibhū. Sesaṃ bhikkhūva, rassova viseso.
anya-e0813n:358_0: 104. Evaṃ sabbaññū. Pubbeva yonaṃ nokāro ca. Sabbaññuno, sabbaññū.
anya-e0813n:361_0: “Yosu ce”ti gosaddokārassa āvo, “tato yonamo tu”tīha tusaddena yonaṃ o. Gāvo. Tathālapane.
anya-e0813n:363_0: Amhi pare gosaddokārassa āvaavā honti, casaddena hinaṃvajjitesu sesesupi.
anya-e0813n:364_1: “Āvassu vā”ti amhi āvantassa uttaṃ vā, gāhvaṃ, gāvaṃ, gavaṃ. Yo- gāvo. Gāvena, gavena. Gobhi, gohi.
anya-e0813n:365_1: “Gāva se”ti se ossa āvo. Gāvassa, gavassa.
anya-e0813n:366_1: “Suhināsu ce”tīha cakārena gossa gu ca. Dvitte- gunnaṃ, gonaṃ. Gāvā, gavā, gāvamhā, gavamhā, gāvasmā, gavasmā. Gobhi, gohi.
anya-e0813n:367_0: 110. Gāve, gave, gāvamhi, gavamhi, gāvasmiṃ, gavasmiṃ. Gāvesu, gavesu, gosu.
anya-e0813n:371_0: “Ā gho”ti itthiyaṃ ākārassa ghasaññā. Yo lope – kaññā. Pakkhe – kaññāyo.
anya-e0813n:372_0: 112. “Ghate ce”ti gassa e. He-kaññe. Kaññā, kaññāyo.
anya-e0813n:378_0: Ghapehi smino yaṃ vā hoti. Kaññāyaṃ, kaññāya. Kaññāsu.
anya-e0813n:383_0: “Pato yā”ti nādekavacanānaṃ yā. Rattiyā. Rattībhi, rattīhi.
anya-e0813n:386_0: 122. Nadī. Sesaṃ rattīva. Aghattā rassova viseso.
anya-e0813n:392_0: Itthiyaṃ vattamānā akārantato āpaccayo hoti. Saralopapakalyādi. Kaññā.
anya-e0813n:393_0: “Dhātuppaccayavibhatti vajjitamatthavaṃ liṅga”nti vacanato paccayantassāliṅgattā taddhitādisutte cakārena nāmamiva kate – syādi.
anya-e0813n:394_0: Evaṃ ajā, eḷakā, kokilā, assā, mūsikā, balākā, mandā, jarāiccādi.
anya-e0813n:397_0: Itthiyaṃ nadādito vā anadādito vā ī hoti. Nadī, nagarī, kumārī, brāhmaṇī, taruṇī, kukkuṭī,
anya-e0813n:402_0: 127. “Ṇa va ṇikaṇeyya ṇantūhī”ti ī. Mānavī, nāvikī, venateyyī, gotamī.
anya-e0813n:403_0: 128. “Ntussa tamīkāre”ti ntussa to vā. Guṇavatī, guṇavantī. Dhitimatī, dhitimantī.
anya-e0813n:406_0: Patyādīhi īkārantehi ca itthiyaṃ inī hoti.
anya-e0813n:413_0: Akāranteti napuṃsakehi sissa nicaṃ aṃ hoti. Cittaṃ.
anya-e0813n:416_0: Akārantehi na puṃsakehi yonaṃ niccaṃ ni hoti, nissa ā. Cittā. Pakkhe – yosvādinā dīghe – cittāni.
anya-e0813n:418_0: 132. Cittaṃ. Nissa e – citte, cittāni. Sesaṃ buddhova.
anya-e0813n:424_0: Vibhatyādese sare pare manādito sāgamo vā hoti. Manasā.
anya-e0813n:426_0: Manādito sassa o hoti, casaddena smāssa ā ca. Manaso, manasā.
anya-e0813n:429_0: Manaṃ siraṃ uraṃ tejaṃ, rajaṃ ojaṃ vayaṃ payaṃ;
anya-e0813n:430_0: Yasaṃ tapaṃ vacaṃ cetaṃ, evamādi manogaṇo.
anya-e0813n:432_0: “Aṃ napuṃsake”ti simhi savibhattissa ntussa aṃ. Guṇavaṃ. Ntussa tte – guṇavantāni.
anya-e0813n:436_0: “Yonanni napuṃsakehī”ti yonaṃ ni vā. Aṭṭīni. Jhattā yolope – aṭṭhī. Tathālapane.
anya-e0813n:443_1: Pumitthiliṅgā – ghaṭa, kaṭa, yaṭṭhi, muṭṭhi, sindhu,
anya-e0813n:444_0: Yathā – ghaṭo, īpaccaye-ghaṭī. Eso yaṭṭhi, esā yaṭṭhiccādi.
anya-e0813n:445_0: Dvipadajātivācino yathā – khattiyo. Āpaccaye- khattiyā, samaṇo, īmhi-samaṇīiccādi.
anya-e0813n:446_0: Catuppadajātivācino yathā – gajo, ā-gajā, byaggho, īmhi - byagghīiccādi.
anya-e0813n:448_2: kusuma saṅgama, paduma, assama, vihāra, sarīra, suvaṇṇa, vaṇṇa, kahāpaṇa, bhavana, bhuvana, yobbana, bhusana, āsana, sayana, odana, ākāsa, upavāsa, māsa, divasa, rasa, thala, phala,
anya-e0813n:452_2: taṭa puṭa patta maṇḍala kalasā dayo, nāmīkatā,
anya-e0813n:452_3: sabbanāmāni ca. Yathā – taṭo, īmhi – taṭī,
anya-e0813n:453_0: Nāmīkatā yathā – devadatto, ā – devadattā devadattamiccādi.
anya-e0813n:455_0: 148. Sabba, katara, katama, ubhaya, itara, añña, aññatara, aññatama, pubba, para, apara, dakkhiṇa, uttara, eka, ya, ta, eta, ima, amu, kiṃ, tumha, amha-
anya-e0813n:459_0: Sabbādīnamakārato paro paṭhamo yo ettaṃ yāti sabbe.
anya-e0813n:460_0: “Tayo neva ca sabbanāmehī”ti nisedhā sasmāsminnaṃ āya ā e na honti. Sabbassa.
anya-e0813n:465_0: Namhi sabbādīnamakārassa e hoti. Sabbesaṃ, sabbesānaṃ.
anya-e0813n:466_0: 149. Itthiyaṃ ā, sabbā kaññāva. Ayaṃ viseso. Vātveva.
anya-e0813n:468_0: Ghapasaññāto sabbādito smiṃsānaṃ saṃsā vā honti.
anya-e0813n:471_0: Ekavacanasaṃsāsu gho rassaṃ yāti. Sabbassā, sabbāya. Sabbāsaṃ,
anya-e0813n:473_0: Ghapaññāhi sabbādīhi smino āya yā na honti.
anya-e0813n:475_0: Sabbādayo napuṃsake tatiyādīsu sakasakapumasamā. Evaṃ ya - saddantā.
anya-e0813n:476_1: Pubbaparāparehi tu smino “yadanupapannā nipātanā sijjhantī”ti anitthiyaṃ e vā. Pubbe,
anya-e0813n:477_0: Ekasaddo saṅkhyātulyaññāsahāyattho. Yadā saṅkhyattho, tadekavacano, aññattha sabbavacano ca.
anya-e0813n:482_0: Simhi anapuṃsakānaṃ etataiccetesaṃ takārassa sa hoti. So.
anya-e0813n:484_0: Tiliṅgesu sabbādīnaṃ takārassa no vā hoti. Ne, te. Sesaṃ sabbasamaṃ, nattaṃva viseso.
anya-e0813n:485_0: 153. Itthiyaṃ – sā, nā, nāyo, tā, tāyoiccādi.
anya-e0813n:491_0: Ekavacanasaṃsāsu tāsaddassa ā ittaṃ vā yāti. Tissāya, tissā, tassā, tāya. Tāsaṃ, tāsānaṃ. Tissaṃ, tassaṃ, tāyaṃ. Tāsu.
anya-e0813n:497_0: Ekavacanasaṃsāsu etāimānamantassa i hoti. Etissāya, etisā, etāya. Etāsaṃ, etāsānaṃ. Etissaṃ, etassaṃ, etāyaṃ. Etāsu.
anya-e0813n:500_0: “Anapuṃsakassāyaṃ simhī”ti imassa ayaṃ. Silopo. Ayaṃ, ime. Imaṃ, ime.
anya-e0813n:501_0: “Animi nāmhi ce”ti imassa ano, imi ca. Anena, iminā.
anya-e0813n:502_0: “Sabbassimasse vā”ti sunaṃhisu evā. Ehi, imehi. Vā smāsasmiṃsaṃsāsvattantveva.
anya-e0813n:504_0: Sasmāsmiṃsaṃsāsu imassa attaṃ vā hoti. Assa, imassa. Esaṃ, esānaṃ, imesaṃ, imesānaṃ. Asmā, imamhā, imasmā. Ehi, imehi. Asmiṃ, imamhi, imasmiṃ. Esu, imesu.
anya-e0813n:505_0: Attapakkhe – “na timehi katākārehī”ti smāsminnaṃ mhāmhi na sijjhante.
anya-e0813n:506_0: 159. Itthiyaṃ – ayaṃ. Sesaṃ etāva, saṃsāsvattaṃva viseso.
anya-e0813n:508_0: “Imassidamaṃsisu napuṃsake”ti imassa idaṃ vā. Idaṃ, imaṃ ime, imāni. Evaṃ dutiyā.
anya-e0813n:511_0: “Amussa mo saṃ”ti massa so vā, silopo. Asu.
anya-e0813n:512_0: “Sabbato ko”ti sabbanāmato kāgamo. “So”ti o, amuko, pakkhe – amu. Amū, amuyo.
anya-e0813n:513_0: Pubbeva yonaṃ vokāro na. Amuṃ. Amū, amuyo. Sesaṃ bhikkhūva sabbādikāriyāññatra.
anya-e0813n:514_3: Visesoyaṃ – amussā, amuyā. Amūsaṃ, amūsānaṃ. Amussaṃ, amuyaṃ. Amūsu.
anya-e0813n:516_0: “Amussāduṃ”ti aduṃ. Aduṃ. Amū, amūni. Evaṃ dutiyā.
anya-e0813n:517_0: 164. “Sesesu ce”ti sabbattha kissa ko. Ko, kā, kaṃ iccādi. Liṅgattaye sabbasamo.
anya-e0813n:521_0: Simhi savibhattīnaṃ tumhamhānaṃ tvaṃ ahaṃ honti.
anya-e0813n:521_1: Casaddena tumhassa tuvaṃ ca. Tvaṃ, tuvaṃ, ahaṃ. Yo – tumhe.
anya-e0813n:522_0: “Mayaṃ yomhi paṭhame”ti amhassa mayaṃ hoti. Mayaṃ.
anya-e0813n:524_0: “Tavaṃ mamañca navā”ti amhi tavaṃ mamañca navā.
anya-e0813n:525_0: “Tumhassa tuvaṃ tvamamhī”ti tumhassa tuvaṃ, tvañca. Taṃ, tavaṃ, tuvaṃ, tvaṃ, maṃ, mamaṃ.
anya-e0813n:527_0: “Vā yoppaṭhamo”ti dutiyāyossa ākaṃ vā. Tumhākaṃ, tumhe. Amhākaṃ, amhe.
anya-e0813n:528_1: “Nāmhi tayā mayā”ti nāmhi tayā mayā honti.
anya-e0813n:528_2: “Tayātayīnaṃ takāro tvattaṃvā”ti tassa tvo vā. Tvayā, tayā, mayā. Tumhehi, amhehi.
anya-e0813n:529_0: 168. “Tava mama se”ti se tava mama honti.
anya-e0813n:532_0: “Amhassa mamaṃ savibhattissa se”ti se amhassa mamaṃ ca. Tava, tuyhaṃ, tumhaṃ, mama, mayhaṃ, amhaṃ, mamaṃ.
anya-e0813n:533_0: “Tumhamhehi namākaṃ”ti naṃvacanassa ākaṃ. Tumhākaṃ, amhākaṃ. Smānāva.
anya-e0813n:534_1: “Tumhāmhānaṃ tayi mayī”ti smimhi tayi mayi honti.
anya-e0813n:534_2: Tve kate - tvayi, tayi, mayi, tumhesu, amhesu.
anya-e0813n:537_1: dutiyā catutthī chaṭṭhī bahuvacanesu paresu padasmā paresaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tumhāmhānaṃ vonokārā navā honti.
anya-e0813n:538_0: Rakkhatu vo, passatu no, dadāti vo, dadāhi no, saddhā vo, satthā no.
anya-e0813n:541_0: “Temekavacanesu ce”ti catutthīchaṭṭhekavacanesu te me honti. Dadāmi te, dadāhi me, idaṃ te, ayaṃ me.
anya-e0813n:542_0: “Naamhī”ti amhi nisedho. Passetha taṃ, ajini maṃ.
anya-e0813n:543_0: “Vā tatiye ce”ti tatiyekavacane te me vā honti. Kataṃ te tayā vā. Kataṃ me mayā vā.
anya-e0813n:544_1: Bahuvacane paṭhame yomhi ca. Kataṃ vo, kataṃ no,
anya-e0813n:550_0: “Yosu dvinnaṃ dve ce”ti dvissa dve hoti. Dve, dve, dvībhi, dvīhi.
anya-e0813n:552_0: Namhi dvādito nakārāgamo hoti. Dvinnaṃ, dvīsu, liṅgattaye samaṃ.
anya-e0813n:553_0: 174. Ticatunnaṃ tisso catasso tayo cattāro tīṇi cattāri.
anya-e0813n:554_0: Yosu itthipumanapuṃsakesu savibhattīnaṃ ticatunnaṃ tisso catasso ādayo honti. Tayo, tayo, tībhi, tīhi, tinnaṃ.
anya-e0813n:555_0: “Iṇṇamiṇṇannaṃ tīhi saṅkhyāhī”ti tisaddato naṃiccassa iṇṇaṃ iṇṇannaṃ ca. Tiṇṇaṃ, tiṇṇannaṃ, tīsu.
anya-e0813n:557_0: “No cā”do cakārena namhi ssaṃāgamo, vaggantetissanaṃ, tīsu.
anya-e0813n:563_0: 180. “Pañcādīna makāro”ti yosu savibhattissa pañcādyantassa attaṃ. Pañca, pañca.
anya-e0813n:565_0: 181. Evaṃ cha satta aṭṭha nava dasādayo aṭṭhārasantā.
anya-e0813n:566_0: 182. Vīsatyādayo ānavutiyā itthiliṅgā ekavacanantā, vīsati rattīva. Evaṃ tiṃsati.
anya-e0813n:567_0: Cattālīsaṃ paññāsaṃ saddehi parāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ “sabbāsamā”dotīha ādisaddena lopo,
anya-e0813n:577_1: Tasmā tadantānampi vibhatyantattā padattaṃ siddhanti na puna vibhatti.
anya-e0813n:577_4: ettha “pitādīna masimhi” tyatrāsimhiggahaṇena tomhi pitādīnaṃ ussa i.
anya-e0813n:579_0: Thaṃādīsu paresu imassa i hoti. Ito.
anya-e0813n:580_0: “Sabbassetassākāro vā”ti tothesvetassa attaṃ vā, ato, etto. Pakkhe- “saralopā”dinā akāralopo.
anya-e0813n:582_0: “Kvaci to”ti suttadvidhākaraṇena sattamyatthe ca to hoti, ādismiṃ, ādito.
anya-e0813n:583_5: Ettha “tre nicca”nti pubbe etassa a. Kutra, kuttha.
anya-e0813n:585_0: 186. “Kismā vo ce”ti vappaccayo. “Kissa ka vece”ti ko, kakārākāralopo. Kva.
anya-e0813n:586_3: Cakārena hiñcanaṃ dācanaṃsu ca. Kuhiṃ, kuhaṃ,
anya-e0813n:592_0: “Kiṃsabbaññekayakuhi dādācana”nti kiṃ ādito dā, dācanaṃ ca. Kasmiṃ kāle kadā, kudācanaṃ.
anya-e0813n:593_0: “Sabbassa so dāmhi vā”ti sabbassa so vā. Sadā, sabbadā.
anya-e0813n:594_0: 193. “Tamhā dāni ce”ti dāni, dā ca. Tadāni, tadā.
anya-e0813n:595_2: samānāparehi ca yathāsaṅkhyaṃ jja jjuppaccayā, ima,
anya-e0813n:595_3: samānānaṃ a, sā ca. Ajja, sajju, aparajju.
anya-e0813n:596_0: 195. “Imasmā rahidhunādāni ce”ti rahyādippaccayā. “Eta rahimhī”ti imassa eto. Etarahi.
anya-e0813n:597_0: “A dhunāmhi ce”ti imassa a. Adhunā, idāni.
anya-e0813n:600_0: Etehi parā sabbā vibhattī lupyante. Tvaṃ āvuso, tumhe āvuso.
anya-e0813n:603_0: Pa parā ni nī u du saṃ vi ava anu pari adhi abhi pati su ā ati api apa upa ete vīsatyupasaggā.
anya-e0813n:604_0: Ca na va vā mā hi dhi ci ku tu nu ce re he sve ve vo kho no to yaṃ naṃ taṃ kiṃ handa kira eva kīva yāva
anya-e0813n:604_1: tāva vata vatha atha aṅga iṅgha taggha āma nāma nūna puna pana āha saha sakkā labbhā heṭṭhā ārā dūrā
anya-e0813n:604_2: divā navā vinā nānā addhā mudhā micchā pacchā āvi sakkhi sacci sacchi bahi yadi iti kinti atthi sotthi
anya-e0813n:604_3: khalu nanu kimu assu yagghe sace have suve are pure namo tiro adho atho aho raho hīyo bhīyo anto pāto
anya-e0813n:604_4: sudaṃ kallaṃ evaṃ dhuvaṃ alaṃ halaṃ sayaṃ sāyaṃ samaṃ sāmaṃ kāmaṃ pāraṃ oraṃ ciraṃ huraṃ ahaṃ sahaṃ uccaṃ
anya-e0813n:604_6: athavā antarā ārakā bāhirā bahiddhā yāvatā tāvatā samantā sāmantā āmantā sammukhā carahi tarahi sampati
anya-e0813n:604_7: āyati upari yāvade tāvade tiriyaṃ sanikaṃ sasakkaṃ ettāvatā parammukhā kittāvatā etarahi aññadatthu seyyathidaṃ
anya-e0813n:605_0: 198. Sadisā ye tiliṅgesu, sabbāsu ca vibhattīsu.
anya-e0813n:606_0: Vacanesu ca sabbesu, te nipātāti kittitā.
anya-e0813n:614_2: Nipātā tu keci visumpi. Yathā – pahāro, paharati,
anya-e0813n:614_3: sā ca so ca bhāsati vā karoti vā,
anya-e0813n:625_0: Bhinnappavattinimittā saddā ekasmiṃ vatthuni pavattā tulyādhikaraṇā,
anya-e0813n:625_1: visesanavisesassabhūtā samānādhikaraṇā dve padā yadā samasyante,
anya-e0813n:626_0: Nāma, idha vā samāsasuttāni saññādvārena samāsavidhāyakāni.
anya-e0813n:627_0: Aggahitavisesanā buddhi visessamhi na uppajjatīti visesanaṃ pubbaṃ hoti,
anya-e0813n:627_1: samāseneva tulyādhikaraṇattassa vuttattā tappakāsanatthaṃ payuttā samāsato atirittā ca so iccete “vuttaṭṭhānamappayogo”ti ñāyā nappayujjante.
anya-e0813n:629_0: Tesaṃ yuttatthānaṃ samāsānaṃ pubbuttarapadānaṃ vibhattī lupyante, cakārena kvaci na.
anya-e0813n:630_0: Tato mahanta vīra iti ca rūpappasaṅge –
anya-e0813n:632_1: parabhūtassa ca assa samāsapadassa pakati hotītīha luttākārā punānīyante.
anya-e0813n:636_0: Taddhitādayo nāmaṃ iva daṭṭhabbā taveppabhutipaccaye vajjetvā.
anya-e0813n:638_0: 204. Kammadhārayo dvando ca, tappuriso ca lābhino.
anya-e0813n:640_1: Rattā ca sā paṭī cāti rattapaṭī,
anya-e0813n:640_2: mahantī ca sā saddhā cāti mahāsaddhā.
anya-e0813n:640_3: Ettha “kammadhārayasaññe ce”ti pubbapade pumeva kate āīpaccayānaṃ nivutti.
anya-e0813n:641_3: satthi ca sā sāmā cāti satthisāmā.
anya-e0813n:642_0: Visesanavisessānaṃ yathecchattā kvaci visesanaṃ paraṃ hoti,
anya-e0813n:644_0: 207. Nasaddā si, tassa lopo. Na suro asuro.
anya-e0813n:646_1: “Nāmānaṃ samāso”ti sutte dvidhākate ayuttatthānampi kvaci samāso.
anya-e0813n:649_0: Ettha “saṅkhyāpubbo digū”ti kammadhārayassa digusaññā. ‘Digussekattaṃ”ti ekattaṃ, napuṃsakattañca.
anya-e0813n:653_0: Dutiyantādayo parapadehi nāmehi yadā samasyante, tadā so samāso tappuriso nāma.
anya-e0813n:655_0: “Passa vāsiṭṭha gāmaṃ, gato tisso sāvatthiṃ”tya trāyuttatthatāya na samāso. Tathā ññatra ñeyyaṃ.
anya-e0813n:661_0: 213. Buddhassa deyyaṃ buddhaddeyyaṃ, parassapadaṃ, ettha vibhatyalopo. Evaṃ attanopadamiccādi.
anya-e0813n:664_0: “Brāhmaṇassa kaṇhā dantā” iccatra dantāpekkhā chaṭṭhīti kaṇhena sambandhābhāvā na samāso.
anya-e0813n:664_1: Yadā tu kaṇhā ca te dantā ceti kammadhārayo,
anya-e0813n:664_2: tadā chaṭṭhī kaṇhadantāpekkhāti brāhmaṇakaṇhadantāti samāso hoteva.
anya-e0813n:665_1: “Rañño māgadhassa dhana” ntyatra raññoti chaṭṭhī dhana mapekkhate,
anya-e0813n:665_3: Rājā eva māgadhasaddena vuccateti bhedābhāvā sambandhābhāvoti tulyādhikaraṇena māgadhena saha rājā na samasyate.
anya-e0813n:666_0: Rañño asso puriso ce” tya tra rañño asso,
anya-e0813n:666_1: rañño puriso ti ca paccekaṃ sambandhato sāpekkhatā atthīti na samāso.
anya-e0813n:666_2: “Asso ca puriso cā”ti dvande kate tu rājassapurisāti hoteva,
anya-e0813n:670_0: Kvaci nindāyaṃ - kūpe maṇḍūko viya kūpamaṇḍūko. Evaṃ nagarakāko iccādi. Atropamāya nindā gamyate.
anya-e0813n:674_0: Appaṭhamantāna maññesaṃ padānaṃ atthesu dve vā bahūni vā nāmāni yadā samasyante,
anya-e0813n:675_0: Āgatā samaṇā yaṃ sā āgatasamaṇo, vihāro.
anya-e0813n:676_1: Jitāni indriyāni yena so jitindriyo, bhagavā.
anya-e0813n:677_0: 220. Karaṇe tu-chinno rukkho yena so chinnarukkho, pharasu.
anya-e0813n:678_0: 221. Dinno suṅko yassa so dinnasuṅko, rājā.
anya-e0813n:679_0: 222. Niggatā janā yasmā so niggatajano, gāmo.
anya-e0813n:680_1: Dasa balāni yassa so dasabalo, bhagavā.
anya-e0813n:682_12: Mattā bahavo mātaṅgā yasmiṃ taṃ mattabahumātaṅgaṃ, vanaṃ.
anya-e0813n:684_1: Suvaṇṇassa viya vaṇṇo yassa so suvaṇṇavaṇṇo.
anya-e0813n:685_1: Saha hetunā yo vattate so sahetuko,
anya-e0813n:686_1: Satta vā aṭṭha vā sattaṭṭha, māsā,
anya-e0813n:686_3: Dakkhiṇassā ca pubbassā ca disāya yaṃ antarālaṃ,
anya-e0813n:688_0: Appaṭhamantānanti kiṃ, desito buddhena yo dhammo.
anya-e0813n:691_1: ti piṇḍīkaraṇaṃ ekavibhattikānaṃ nāmānaṃ yo samuccayo,
anya-e0813n:692_0: Cando ca sūriyo ca candasūriyā. Tiṭṭhanti tyādi-
anya-e0813n:694_0: 228. Tathā dvande pāṇi turiya yogga senaṅga khuddajantuka vividha viruddha visabhāgatthādīnañca.
anya-e0813n:695_2: vividhā ca te sabhāgā ceti visabhāgā.
anya-e0813n:696_0: Cakkhusotaṃ, gītavāditaṃ, yuganaṅgalaṃ, hatthassaṃ, asicammaṃ, ḍaṃsamakasaṃ, kokālūkaṃ.
anya-e0813n:704_0: 229. Vibhāsā rukkha tiṇa pasu dhana dhañña janapadādīnañca.
anya-e0813n:705_0: Dvande rukkhādīnaṃ ekattaṃ napuṃsakattañca vā hoti.
anya-e0813n:708_0: Ādisaddena aññesupi vā. Yathā – niccavirodhīnamaddabbānaṃ - kusalākusalaṃ, kusalākusalāni.
anya-e0813n:715_0: Upasaggādipubbako saddo vibhatyatthādīsu samāso hoti, abyayībhāvasañño ca.
anya-e0813n:716_0: “So napuṃsakaliṅgo”ti abyayībhāvo napuṃsakaliṅgo, yadādinā ekavacano ca.
anya-e0813n:719_0: Anakārantā abyayībhāvā parā sabbā vibhattī lujjare. Adhitthi, vibhattīnamattho ādhārādi.
anya-e0813n:720_0: Idhādhisaddo ādhārevattate, adhitthiiccetaṃ padaṃ itthiya miccetamatthaṃ vadati.
anya-e0813n:721_0: Samīpaṃ nagarassa upanagaraṃ. “Aṃvibhattīnamakārantabyayībhāvā”ti vibhattīnaṃ kvaci aṃ.
anya-e0813n:723_0: Abhāvo makkhikānaṃ nimmakkhikaṃ rasso. Anupubbo therānaṃ anutheraṃ, anatikkamma sattiṃ yathāsatti.
anya-e0813n:726_0: Ā pabbatā khettaṃ āpabbataṃ khettaṃ, mariyādāyaṃ, vajjamānā sīmā mariyādā, pabbataṃ vinātyattho.
anya-e0813n:727_0: Ā jalantā sītaṃ ājalantaṃ sītaṃ, abhividhimhi, gayhamānā sīmā abhividhi, jalantena sahetyattho.
anya-e0813n:732_0: Kammadhārayaka tappurisā dve, dvendo ca bahubbīhi ca ñeyyā.
anya-e0813n:737_0: Chaṭṭhantā saddā “tassāpacca”miccasmiṃ atthe ṇo vā hoti.
anya-e0813n:740_0: “Vuddhādisarassa vā saṃyogantassa saṇe ce”ti saṇakāre pare asaṃyogantassādisarassa vuddhi.
anya-e0813n:743_0: Akārivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṃ āeovuddhiyo honti, casaddena kvaci na.
anya-e0813n:748_3: Vikappavidhānato taddhitena samāsassāccantaṃ bādhāyā bhāvā vasiṭṭhā paccantipi hoti.
anya-e0813n:752_0: Vacchādito gottagaṇato ṇāyano ṇāno ca vā hoti.
anya-e0813n:753_0: Apaccaṃ paputtappabhuti gottaṃ. Kaccassāpaccaṃ kaccāyano, kaccāno vā. Saṃyogantattā na vuddhi.
anya-e0813n:756_0: Akārantato apacce ṇi vā hoti, puna vāsaddena ṇiko, akārantā anakārantā ca bopi.
anya-e0813n:758_0: 236. “Ṇavo pagvādīhī” ti ṇavo. Manuno apaccaṃ māṇavo.
anya-e0813n:761_1: “Yena vā saṃsaṭṭhaṃ tarati carati vahati ṇiko”ti ṇiko.
anya-e0813n:762_0: Sakaṭena caratīti sākaṭiko. Sīsena vahatīti sīsiko, na vuddhi.
anya-e0813n:766_0: Taṃ adhīte iccādīsvatthesu ādisaddena hatādīsu ca ṇiko vā hoti.
anya-e0813n:769_9: vāto assa ābādho atthīti vā vātiko,
anya-e0813n:771_0: 240. Ṇa rāgā tena rattaṃ tassedamaññatthesu ca.
anya-e0813n:772_0: Tena rattaṃ tyādyatthesu ṇo vā hoti. Kasāvena rattaṃ kāsāvaṃ.
anya-e0813n:773_0: Evaṃ nīlaṃ pītamiccādi. Na vuddhi, mahisassa idaṃ māhisaṃ, siṅgaṃ.
anya-e0813n:774_1: ettha “ayuvaṇṇānañcā” do puna vuddhiggahaṇena uttarapadassa vuddhi.
anya-e0813n:778_0: Evaṃ andhakiyo. Putto assa atthīti puttimo, puttiyo. Evaṃ kappiyo.
anya-e0813n:784_0: Ayametesaṃ atisayena pāpoti pāpataro, pāpatamo, pāpissiko, pāpiyo, pāpiṭṭho vā.
anya-e0813n:785_1: “saralopā”do pakatiggahaṇena pakatyabhāvā issa e. Jeyyo, jeṭṭho.
anya-e0813n:786_0: Evaṃ “pasatthassa so ce”ti sādese seyyo, seṭṭho.
anya-e0813n:788_0: 245. “Tadassatthīti vī ce”ti vī. Medhā assa atthīti medhāvī.
anya-e0813n:790_0: 247. “Daṇḍādito ika ī”ti iko, ī ca. Daṇḍiko, daṇḍī.
anya-e0813n:791_0: 248. “Guṇādito vantū”ti vantu. Guṇavā, paññavā. Yadādinā rasso.
anya-e0813n:800_0: “Dvitīhi tiyo”ti tiyo, “tiye dutāpi ce”ti dvitīnaṃ dutā. Dvinnaṃ pūraṇo dutiyo, evaṃ tatiyo.
anya-e0813n:803_0: Catuttha dutiya tatiyānaṃ aḍḍhūpapadena saha aḍḍhuḍḍha divaḍḍha diyaḍḍhāḍḍhatiyā honti.
anya-e0813n:804_0: Aḍḍhena catuttho aḍḍhuḍḍho, aḍḍhena dutiyo divaḍḍho, diyaḍḍho vā, aḍḍhena tatiyo aḍḍhatiyo.
anya-e0813n:805_0: 256. “Saṅkhyāpūraṇe mo”ti mo, pañcamo. Itthiyaṃ pañcannaṃ pūraṇī pañcamī.
anya-e0813n:806_0: Eko ca dasa cāti dvande kate –
anya-e0813n:808_0: Saṅkhyāne uttarapade dviekaaṭṭhaiccetesa mantassa ā vā hoti. Ekādasa pañcīva. Evaṃ dvādasa.
anya-e0813n:809_0: Yadādinā tissa teādese “ekādito dassa ra saṅkhyāne”ti dasasadde dassa ro. Terasa.
anya-e0813n:810_1: “Catūpapadassa lopo tuttarapadādicassa cucopi navā”ti catusadde tussa lopo cassa cu ca. Cuddasa.
anya-e0813n:811_0: “Dase so niccañce”ti chassa soādese – “ḷa darānaṃ”ti dasasadde dassa ḷo. Soḷasa, aṭṭhārasa.
anya-e0813n:812_0: 258. “Vīsati dasesu bā dvissa tū”ti dvissa bā. Bāvīsati, ekādasannaṃ pūraṇo ekādasamo.
anya-e0813n:814_0: “Dvādito konekatthe ce”ti ko, dve parimāṇāni asseti dvikaṃ. Evaṃ tikādi.
anya-e0813n:815_0: 260. “Samūhatthe kaṇṇā”ti kaṇa ca, ṇo ca. Manussānaṃ samūho mānussako, mānusso vā.
anya-e0813n:816_1: “jhalānamiyuvā sare vā” tīha vākārena issa ayādese – dvayaṃ, tayaṃ.
anya-e0813n:819_0: Bhāvatthe ṇyattatā honti. Tusaddena ttano ca. Sakatthādīsupi ṇyo, sakatthe tā ca.
anya-e0813n:828_0: Ye pare avaṇṇo lupyate, cakārena ikāropi.
anya-e0813n:829_0: Yavataṃ talaṇadakārānaṃ byañjanāni calaña jakāratta”nti yakārayuttānaṃ tādīnaṃ cādayo,
anya-e0813n:829_1: kāraggahaṇena sakapabhamādito parayakārassa pubbena saha kvaci pubbarūpañca, dvittaṃ.
anya-e0813n:829_2: Paṇḍiccaṃ, kosallaṃ, sāmaññaṃ, sohajjaṃ, porissaṃ, nepakkaṃ, sāruppaṃ, osabbhaṃ, opammaṃ.
anya-e0813n:831_0: Iuiccetesaṃ ā hoti, rikārāgamo ca ṭhāne.
anya-e0813n:833_0: Ārissaṃ. Evaṃ mudutā, arahatā, ntassa yadādinā lopo.
anya-e0813n:836_3: Ettha ussa ātte parūkārassa yadādinā avo.
anya-e0813n:841_0: 268. “Kimimehi tha”nti thaṃ, kādese-kathaṃ. Iādese-itthaṃ, thanti yogavibhāgena thaṃ-bahutthaṃ.
anya-e0813n:842_2: abhūtatabbhāve gamyamāne karabhūyoge sati nāmato yadādinā īppaccayo,
